fields.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
fields.cooking_instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti. 2. Prepare the Bolognese sauce with minced beef and tomato sauce. 3. Combine and serve.

fields.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
fields.cooking_instructions: 1. Grill chicken. 2. Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing. 3. Add croutons, parmesan, and chicken. 4. Serve.

fields.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
fields.cooking_instructions: 1. Chop vegetables. 2. Stir fry vegetables in a wok with soy sauce. 3. Serve with rice or noodles.

fields.name: Beef Tacos
fields.cooking_instructions: 1. Cook beef with taco seasoning. 2. Prepare taco shells. 3. Fill shells with beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa. 4. Serve.

fields.name: Pancakes
fields.cooking_instructions: 1. Mix pancake batter. 2. Cook pancakes on a griddle. 3. Serve with syrup and butter.
